Package org.restlet

Top-level classes, interfaces and exceptions.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Element Element of a software architecture.
Maplet Mapper of calls to other restlets.
Resource Intended conceptual target of a hypertext reference.
Restlet Handler of calls to resources or sets of resources.
RestletCall Represents a call to be handled by restlets.
RestletFactory Factory for common restlet objects.
UniformCall Represents a call handled via the uniform interface.
UniformInterface Uniform interface between all architecture components.
 

Class Summary
AbstractRestlet Abstract restlet that can be easily subclassed.
DefaultMaplet Default maplet that can be easily subclassed.
RestletCallWrapper Restlet call wrapper.
RestletManager The main restlet manager that also acts as an instance factory for common restlet interfaces.
UniformCallWrapper Uniform call wrapper.
 

Exception Summary
RestletException Generic exception used in the Restlet framework.
 

Package org.restlet Description

Top-level classes, interfaces and exceptions.

Since:
1.0
See Also:
REST dissertation by Roy T. Fielding
